sourcesContent:
import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from '../ui/card' import { Button } from '../ui/button' import { Badge } from '../ui/badge' import { TrendingUp, Users, DollarSign, Activity, ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react' export function HomePage() { const stats = [ { label: 'Active Players', value: '1,247', icon: Users, change: '+12%' }, { label: 'Total Deals', value: '$2.4M', icon: DollarSign, change: '+23%' }, { label: 'Market Activity', value: '94%', icon: Activity, change: '+5%' }, { label: 'Growth Rate', value: '18.2%', icon: TrendingUp, change: '+8%' } ] const recentDeals = [ { player: 'Marcus Johnson', brand: 'Nike Local', value: '$15K', sport: 'Basketball' }, { player: 'Sarah Williams', brand: 'Adidas Regional', value: '$12K', sport: 'Soccer' }, { player: 'David Chen', brand: 'Local Fitness Co.', value: '$8K', sport: 'Tennis' } ] return (

Dashboard

AI-powered sports agency connecting athletes with local endorsement opportunities.

{stats.map((stat, index) => ( {stat.label}
{stat.value}

{stat.change} from last month

))}
Recent Deals {recentDeals.map((deal, index) => (

{deal.player}

{deal.brand}

{deal.value}

{deal.sport}
))} Quick Actions
) }
